comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: I've ascertained the following from a quick search on Trove: The Middle Head Easter disaster happened on Friday 3 April 1891. That's a little spookie - TODAY is the anniversary. The burial took place on Sunday 5 April 1891. The remains were going to be buried at sea but the coroner ordered them coffined. The memorial was unveiled by Major-General Hutton at half past three on Sunday 6 May 1894.
